name: Villain city
description:
Welcome to Crime city.

This game is a simulation of a crime organization.

Each days missions are availlable to do depending on your organization level.

Moreover an event can occur and it affect the world balance (criminality rate or city wealth).

You can upgrade your organization by providing necessary materials (crime currency and minions) depending on the organization level you want to have.

Each of your action will have consequences on the world.

Interesting datas to keep in mind :

The game time calculation is as follow :  6 minutes in real world is one day in the game.

Your minions generate about 0.5 cc (crime currency) per hours.

The game isn't finished though.

Enjoy  :-)
